title: Heroku
content:
Install:
```
sudo snap install heroku --classic
```

<hr>

Login:
```
heroku login
```

<hr>

Clone: 
```
heroku git:clone -a stark-chamber-36060
```

<hr>

Re-Connect:
```
heroku git:remote --app stark-chamber-36060
```

confirm: `git remote -v`

<hr>

Rename:
```
git remote rename heroku DoraServer
```

<hr>

Commit:
```
git add && git commit -m "my app" && git push DoraServer main
```

<hr>

DataBase:
```
sudo apt-get install postgresql
```
Connect: 
```
heroku pg:psql --app stark-chamber-36060
```
```
heroku pg:psql --app serene-falls-03482
```

<hr>

Create DataBase Add-On:

```
heroku addons:create --app serene-falls-03482 heroku-postgresql:hobby-dev
```

<hr>
